EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_NY User Group_Q114.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: New York User Group Meeting 3/4/14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our New York User Group Meeting on Tuesday, March 4, 2014. We look forward to you joining us. Here are the event details below: Date: Tuesday, March 4, 2013 Time: 6:30PM (EST) Location: Pivotal Office, 625 Avenue of the Americas, 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10011 Have questions? Email <mailto:info@gopivotal.com> us. Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
